{{infobox character | people=[[Gondorians|Gondorian]] | name=Amrothos | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Gondor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Westron]] | birth={{TA|2994}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Dol Amroth]] | parentage=[[Imrahil]] | siblings=[[Elphir]], [[Erchirion]] and [[Lothíriel]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }}'''Amrothos''' was the third son of [[Imrahil]] of [[Dol Amroth]]. ==History== He was born in {{TA|2994}}. He had one younger sister, [[Lothíriel]] and two older brothers; [[Elphir]] and [[Erchirion]].{{PM|Elendil}}, ''The Line of Dol Amroth'', p. 221 ==Etymology== ''Amrothos'' seems to be a [[Sindarin]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but it could mean "Terror of Amroth" and be a compound of the name ''[[Amroth]]'' and ''gos'' ("dread", "terror").{{HM|GS}}, entry '''Amrothos''', p. 340 ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | | | | | ADR | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |ADR=[[Adrahil]]
